name: @mikeyt23/swig
description: Swig is a simple CLI tool for automating dev workflows via compositions of series and parallel tasks.

scripts.build: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.pack: node tasks.cjs cleanPackedDir && npm pack --pack-destination packed
scripts.updateExamples: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateExampleDependencies
scripts.updateExamplesAndTest: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateExampleDependencies && node tasks.cjs test
scripts.updateEsmAndTest: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build:esm && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateEsmExampleDependency && node tasks.cjs testEsm
scripts.updateCjsAndTest: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build:cjs && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateCjsExampleDependency && node tasks.cjs testCjs
scripts.updateTsAndTest: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build:cjs && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateTsExampleDependency && node tasks.cjs testTs

author: Mike Thompson
